mapper.select: SELECT f.ipaddr ip,a.sensor_id sensorId,a.sensor_type,DATE_FORMAT(a.starttime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') starttime,DATE_FORMAT(a.endtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') endtime FROM(SELECT a.ip,a.sensor_id,a.type sensor_type,a.starttime,b.endTime endtime FROM (SELECT ip,sensor_id,type,MAX(startTime) starttime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=3 AND endId>0 GROUP BY ip,sensor_id,type)a INNER JOIN (SELECT ip,sensor_id,type,startTime,endTime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=3 AND endId>0)b ON a.ip=b.ip AND a.sensor_id=b.sensor_id AND a.type=b.type AND a.starttime=b.startTime)a INNER JOIN (SELECT e.id id,d2.ipaddr,e.sensorId,e.sensor_type FROM t_sensor e LEFT JOIN t_static d ON e.sensor_type=d.id LEFT JOIN t_static d1 ON e.sensor_position=d1.id LEFT JOIN t_substation d2 ON e.station=d2.id)f ON a.ip=f.ipaddr AND a.sensor_id=f.sensorId AND a.sensor_type=f.sensor_type

SELECT ip,sensorId,sensor_type,maxvalues,minvalue,CONVERT(avgvalue,DECIMAL(10,2)) avgvalue FROM ${tablename} WHERE statistictime=(SELECT MAX(statistictime) FROM ${tablename} WHERE remark=1) AND remark=1

SELECT a.id,a.ip,b.sensorId,b.sensor_type,b.alais,b.sensortype,b.unit,b.position,b.limit_alarm,b.floor_alarm,b.limit_power,b.floor_power,b.limit_repower,b.floor_repower, DATE_FORMAT(a.startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') starttime,a.measure measures,DATE_FORMAT(a.measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measurestime FROM (SELECT id,sensor_id,ip,type,startTime,measure,measuretime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=2 AND endId=0)a INNER JOIN (SELECT d2.ipaddr,e.sensorId,e.sensor_type,e.alais,e.limit_alarm,e.floor_alarm, e.limit_power,e.floor_power,e.limit_repower,e.floor_repower,d.v sensortype,d1.v position,d.k unit FROM t_sensor e LEFT JOIN t_static d ON e.sensor_type=d.id LEFT JOIN t_static d1 ON e.sensor_position=d1.id LEFT JOIN t_substation d2 ON e.station=d2.id)b ON a.sensor_id=b.sensorId AND a.ip=b.ipaddr AND a.type=b.sensor_type

SELECT a.id,a.ip,b.sensorId,b.sensor_type,b.alais,b.sensortype,b.unit,b.position,b.limit_alarm,b.floor_alarm,b.limit_power,b.floor_power,b.limit_repower,b.floor_repower, DATE_FORMAT(a.startTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') starttime,a.measure measures,DATE_FORMAT(a.measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measurestime FROM (SELECT id,sensor_id,ip,type,startTime,measure,measuretime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=3 AND endId=0)a INNER JOIN (SELECT d2.ipaddr,e.sensorId,e.sensor_type,e.alais,e.limit_alarm,e.floor_alarm, e.limit_power,e.floor_power,e.limit_repower,e.floor_repower,d.v sensortype,d1.v position,d.k unit FROM t_sensor e LEFT JOIN t_static d ON e.sensor_type=d.id LEFT JOIN t_static d1 ON e.sensor_position=d1.id LEFT JOIN t_substation d2 ON e.station=d2.id)b ON a.sensor_id=b.sensorId AND a.ip=b.ipaddr AND a.type=b.sensor_type

SELECT a.id,a.ip,a.sensor_id sensorId,a.type sensor_type,b.alais,b.sensortype,b.position,DATE_FORMAT(a.starttime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') starttime,a.measure measures,DATE_FORMAT(a.measuretime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measurestime,b.alarm_status,b.alarmstatus FROM (SELECT b.id,a.ip,a.sensor_id,a.type,b.startTime starttime,b.measure,b.measuretime FROM (SELECT ip,sensor_id,type,MAX(startTime) startTime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=2 AND endId=0 GROUP BY ip,sensor_id,type)a INNER JOIN (SELECT id,ip,sensor_id,type,startTime,measure,measuretime FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE status=2 AND endId=0 GROUP BY ip,sensor_id,type,startTime ) b ON a.ip=b.ip AND a.sensor_id=b.sensor_id AND a.type=b.type AND a.startTime=b.startTime )a INNER JOIN (SELECT d.ipaddr,a.sensorId,a.sensor_type,b.v sensortype,a.alais,c.v position,a.alarm_status,b.k alarmstatus FROM t_switch_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_static b ON a.sensor_type=b.id LEFT JOIN t_static c ON a.sensor_position=c.id LEFT JOIN t_substation d ON a.station=d.id )b ON a.ip=b.ipaddr AND a.sensor_id=b.sensorId AND a.type=b.sensor_type

SELECT a.id,a.ip,a.sensorId,b.sensor_type,b.sensortype,b.alais,b.position,DATE_FORMAT(a.starttime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') starttime,a.measures,DATE_FORMAT(a.measurestime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') measurestime,a.debug,a.status FROM (SELECT id,sensor_id sensorId,ip,type,startTime starttime,measure measures,measuretime measurestime,status,debug FROM t_analoginfo_query WHERE (status=5 OR debug=1 OR debug=2) AND endId=0)a INNER JOIN (SELECT b.ipaddr ip,a.sensorId,a.sensor_type,a.alais,c.v sensortype,d.v position FROM t_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_substation b ON a.station=b.id LEFT JOIN t_static c ON a.sensor_type=c.id LEFT JOIN t_static d ON a.sensor_position=d.id WHERE a.control!=3 UNION SELECT b.ipaddr ip,a.sensorId,a.sensor_type,a.alais,c.v sensortype,d.v position FROM t_switch_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_substation b ON a.station=b.id LEFT JOIN t_static c ON a.sensor_type=c.id LEFT JOIN t_static d ON a.sensor_position=d.id WHERE a.control!=3 )b ON a.ip=b.ip AND a.sensorId=b.sensorId AND a.type=b.sensor_type ORDER BY a.sensorId
SELECT a.logic_ip ip,a.logic_devid sensorId,b.id feedId,a.param powervalue,b.power_scope powerposition FROM t_dev_link a LEFT JOIN t_switch_sensor b ON a.action_uid=b.uid where a.action_type=56

SELECT a.id,a.ip,a.sensorId,c.sensor_type,c.sensortype,c.position,b.feeduid,b.powerposition,a.starttime,a.endtime,a.measure measures, a.measuretime measurestime,a.debug,c.limit_alarm,c.floor_alarm,c.limit_power,c.floor_power,c.limit_repower,c.floor_repower,c.alais,c.unit FROM (SELECT a.id,a.sensor_id,a.startTime starttime,a.endTime endtime,SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.link_sensor_id,'.',4) ip, SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.link_sensor_id,'.',-1) sensorId,a.measure,a.measuretime,IF(b.debug>0,b.debug,c.debug) debug FROM t_analoginfo_query a LEFT JOIN t_analoginfo b ON a.startId=b.id LEFT JOIN t_analoginfo c ON a.endId=c.id WHERE a.status=1 AND a.type=0 AND a.endId=0) a INNER JOIN (SELECT a.id,a.uid feeduid,a.power_scope powerposition FROM t_switch_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_static b ON a.sensor_position=b.id )b ON a.sensor_id=b.id INNER JOIN (SELECT a.alais,a.sensorId,b.ipaddr,a.sensor_type,c.k unit,c.v sensortype,d.v position,a.limit_alarm,a.floor_alarm, a.limit_power,a.floor_power,a.limit_repower,a.floor_repower FROM t_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_substation b ON a.station=b.id LEFT JOIN t_static c ON a.sensor_type=c.id LEFT JOIN t_static d ON a.sensor_position=d.id )c ON a.ip=c.ipaddr AND a.sensorId=c.sensorId

SELECT a.id,a.ip,a.sensorId,c.sensor_type,c.sensortype,c.position,b.feeduid,b.powerposition,a.starttime,a.endtime,a.measure measures, a.measuretime measurestime,a.debug,c.alais,c.alarm_status,c.alarmstatus FROM (SELECT a.id,a.sensor_id,a.startTime starttime,a.endTime endtime,SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.link_sensor_id,'.',4) ip, SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.link_sensor_id,'.',-1) sensorId,a.measure,a.measuretime,IF(b.debug>0,b.debug,c.debug) debug FROM t_analoginfo_query a LEFT JOIN t_analoginfo b ON a.startId=b.id LEFT JOIN t_analoginfo c ON a.endId=c.id WHERE a.status=1 AND a.type=0 AND a.endId=0) a INNER JOIN (SELECT a.id,a.uid feeduid,a.power_scope powerposition FROM t_switch_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_static b ON a.sensor_position=b.id )b ON a.sensor_id=b.id INNER JOIN (SELECT a.alais,a.sensorId,b.ipaddr,a.sensor_type,c.v sensortype,d.v position,a.alarm_status,c.k alarmstatus FROM t_switch_sensor a LEFT JOIN t_substation b ON a.station=b.id LEFT JOIN t_static c ON a.sensor_type=c.id LEFT JOIN t_static d ON a.sensor_position=d.id )c ON a.ip=c.ipaddr AND a.sensorId=c.sensorId
